messages.content: NodeGPT is an implementation of AutoGen inside ComfyUI.
No, the repository is under development, and not everything is functioning correctly yet.
What should users be cautious about when sharing workflows in NodeGPT?
Users should not share their workflows with any API keys inside.
What are some key features of NodeGPT?
Some key features of NodeGPT include autogen (Automated Multi Agent Chat), Automated Task Solving with Code Generation, Execution & Debugging, and Automated Complex Task Solving by Group Chat.
What are some of the planned future additions to NodeGPT?
Some planned future additions to NodeGPT include Functions and MemGPT.
Users can install NodeGPT by first installing ComfyUI, then cloning the NodeGPT repository into the 'custom nodes' folder inside ComfyUI. Upon starting, ComfyUI should install the requirements.
What should users do if they encounter issues while installing NodeGPT?
If users encounter issues while installing NodeGPT, they can try running the Update.bat file inside the ComfyUI\custom_nodes\NodeGPT folder.
How can users contribute to the development of NodeGPT?
Users can contribute to the development of NodeGPT by submitting pull requests, suggestions, and issue reports.
